win

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • win.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a user of the Activity Tracking System. Each user has various fields and methods for storing and computing sleep and workout data
    Version:
    1.0 (11/14/2016)
    Author:
    Ana Garcia, Hector Cervantes
    See Also:
    ActivityLogger, Trend, WeeklyTrend, Reminder

      • countDaySleepTime

        public int countDaySleepTime()
        Adds the user's total sleep time within a given time frame by traversing the user's set of Activities.
        Returns:
        daySleep the total amount of sleep the user had in a day
        See Also:
        activities, Activity
